meanings.definition: Not modulated or varied in pitch, volume, or tone.
meanings.sent1: The unmodulated sound of the alarm was loud and constant.
meanings.sent2: The radio played unmodulated music that lacked any changes in volume.
meanings.sent3: The unmodulated voice of the robot made it sound like a broken record.
meanings.sent4: Her unmodulated emotions were like a flat line on a heart monitor.
meanings.sent5: The unmodulated drone of the bee buzzed in the background.

meanings.definition: Not subject to modulation or control.
meanings.sent1: The unmodulated machine continued to operate without any adjustments.
meanings.sent2: The unmodulated power supply caused fluctuations in the system.
meanings.sent3: The unmodulated toddler ran around freely in the park.
meanings.sent4: His unmodulated behavior resembled a wild horse running free.
meanings.sent5: The unmodulated river flowed steadily without any dams.

meanings.sent1: The unmodulated thermostat led to extreme temperatures in the room.
meanings.sent2: The unmodulated clock showed the wrong time all day.
meanings.sent3: The unmodulated student's grades were all over the place.
meanings.sent4: Her unmodulated schedule caused chaos in her daily routine.
meanings.sent5: The unmodulated traffic lights caused confusion at the intersection.
